description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & Ricotta Strudels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry & Ricotta Strudels Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Lay frozen raspberries on a plate lined with paper towel. Set aside to thaw.
Meanwhile, place ricotta, cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in a food processor. Process until smooth. Transfer to a medium bowl.
Using paper towel, squeeze excess liquid from raspberries. Transfer to a bowl. Stir in cornflour. Stir raspberry mixture into ricotta mixture.

Cut pastry sheets in half crossways. Place 3 pieces on a clean work surface. Cover remainder with a damp tea towel to prevent pastry drying out. Spray 2 pastry sheets with oil and layer on top of each other. Scatter 23 tsp breadcrumbs and top with plain piece. Spread ricotta mixture along one long end, leaving a 3cm border on shorter ends. Fold short ends in and roll up to enclose.
Place strudel, seamside down, on tray. Spray top with oil. Repeat with remaining pastry and filling to make 8 stacks.
Bake for 2025 minutes or until pastry is crisp and golden. Cool strudels on tray for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with strawberries and serve with sorbet.
